Kapolri Idham Azis Resmi Sandang Pangkat Jenderal
01 Nov 2019, 09:53 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Idham Azis resmi dilantik Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) sebagai Kapolri. Idham pun mendapat kenaikan pangkat dari Komjen menjadi Jenderal.
Pembacaan keputusan kenaikan pangkat itu digelar di Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta Pusat, usai pengambilan sumpah jabatan Kapolri oleh Jokowi, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Setelah itu, Jokowi menyematkan tanda pangkat bintang empat di bahu Idham. Jokowi juga menyerahkan tongkat komando kepada Idham.
Turut hadir dalam pelantikan ini Ketua DPR Puan Maharani hingga Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto. Sejumlah pimpinan parpol juga tampak hadir, salah satunya Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh.
Sebelumnya, Idham resmi dilantik sebagai Kapolri. Dia menggantikan Jenderal (Purn) Tito Karnavian yang menjadi Menteri Dalam Negeri.
Idham juga sudah melewati proses fit and proper test di Komisi III DPR. Nama Idham kemudian dibawa ke rapat paripurna dan disepakati menjadi Kapolri.

(haf/imk)

National Police Chief Idham Azis Officially Rank General Clothing
01 Nov 2019, 09:53 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Idham Azis was officially inaugurated by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) as National Police Chief. Idham also got a promotion from the General Commission to General.
The reading of the promotion decision was held at the Presidential Palace, Central Jakarta, after taking the oath of Chief of Police by Jokowi, Friday (11/01/2019).
After that, Jokowi pinned a four-star rank on Idham's shoulder. Jokowi also handed the baton to Idham.
Also present at the inauguration were DPR Chairperson Puan Maharani to Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto. A number of political party leaders were also present, one of them was Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh.
Previously, Idham was officially appointed as National Police Chief. He replaces General (Ret) Tito Karnavian who is the Minister of the Interior.
Idham has also passed the fit and proper test process at Commission III of the DPR. Idham's name was then taken to a plenary meeting and agreed to be the National Police Chief.

(haf / imk)
